Package org.rapla.components.iolayer

The IO layer is an abstraction from the io differences in webstart or desktop mode.

See: Description

    Interface Description
    IOInterface
    The IO layer is an abstraction from the io differences in webstart or desktop mode
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComponentPrinter
    Use this to print an awt-Component on one page.
    DefaultIO  
    FileContent  
    ITextPrinter  
    PrintExport
    This class will only work with JDK 1.4 and above, it uses javax.print.PrintService for exporting to postscript format
    WebstartIO  

Package org.rapla.components.iolayer Description

The IO layer is an abstraction from the io differences in webstart or desktop mode. With JDK 1.4 or higher PS export is supported.
